metadata.name: Music4U - Vol 1 #1 - Music4Jade
metadata.description:
This is the first piece I recorded in this project. I recorded this for Jade during the launch of the Music4U project.

Jade gave me a big opportunity to share my music and I wanted to gift this song and experience to her to show my appreciation.

We talk about web3 as if it's something completely new and different, but in reality, we are still just people building relationships and sharing music. This NFT will live forever and holds within it a personal musical memory and a record of a special moment.
